Pointless API Docs

pointless/prelude/boolean.ptls (source)

lessEq(b, a) link 
lessEq(b, a) = a <= b
lessThan(b, a) link 
lessThan(b, a) = a < b
greaterEq(b, a) link 
greaterEq(b, a) = a >= b
greaterThan(b, a) link 
greaterThan(b, a) = a > b
notFunc(x) link 
notFunc(x) = not x
notEq(a, b) link 
notEq(a, b) = a != b
eq(a, b) link 
eq(a, b) = a == b
orFunc(a, b) link 
orFunc(a, b) = a or b
andFunc(a, b) link 
andFunc(a, b) = a and b
inFunc(b, a) link 
inFunc(b, a) = a in b
any(values) link 
Takes a list of boolean values, returns true if any list value is true
all(values) link 
Takes a list of boolean values, returns true if all list values are true
